Most Popular Rivers In the World

Photo Credits: wikimedia.org

Amazon River, Length: 6,575 km, Countries: [ "Brazil", "Colombia", "Peru" ], Continent: South America

Missouri River, Length: 3,767 km, Countries: [ "United States" ], Continent: North America

Murray River, Length: 2,508 km, Countries: [ "Australia" ], Continent: Australia

Nile, Length: 6650 km, Countries: [ "Egypt", "Sudan", "South Sudan", "Ethiopia", "Uganda", "Congo", "Kenya", "Tanzania", "Rwanda", "Burundi" ], Continent: Africa

Onyx River, Length: 32 km, Countries: [ "Antarctica" ], Continent: Antarctica

Paraná River, Length: 4,880 km, Countries: [ "Argentina", "Brazil", "Paraguay" ], Continent: South America

Volga River, Length: 3,530 km, Countries: [ "Russia" ], Continent: Europe

Yangtze, Length: 6,300 km, Countries: [ "China" ], Continent: Asia

Yellow River, Length: 5,464 km, Countries: [ "China" ], Continent: Asia
